str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.
From paraballo; a similitude, i.e. fictitious narrative, apothegm or adage.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To change my position, depart, remove. From meta and airo; to betake oneself, i.e. Remove.
Thence, from that place. From ekei; thence.
